actions.committee: House Committee on Foreign Affairs (Subsequently: International Relations)
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Foreign Affairs (Subsequently: International Relations).

official_title: Concurrent resolution expressing the sense of Congress that the contingent of U.S.  troops stationed in Europe be substantially reduced.

summary.text: Expresses the sense of Congress that the contingent of United States troops stationed in Europe be substantially reduced and that such reductions be accomplished in stages over the next one and one-half years.

titles.title: Concurrent resolution expressing the sense of Congress that the contingent of U.S.  troops stationed in Europe be substantially reduced.
